jobDescription: Analytical ScientistEclaro is looking for an Analytical Scientist for our client in San Diego, CA.  Eclaro’s client is a major technology firm with a prominent presence in large and fast-growing markets, providing products and services that enable businesses and economies to thrive. If you’re up to the challenge, then take a chance at this rewarding opportunity! Position Overview: We are looking for a scientist with a hands-on approach to analytical method development with expertise in separations and spectroscopy. The position will focus on the characterization of enzymes, their reaction products, and fermentation metabolomics. The position is to provide analytical support for the enzyme development projects and enzyme production. Required Skills:
